title: Pilgrim’s Pride Corp. Recalls Poultry Products Due To Possible Foreign Matter Contamination
summary: EDITORS NOTE: This release is being reissued to expand the April 7, 2016, recall to include additional products and production dates. Details of this release were also updated to reflect a change in poundage, types of extraneous materials, and distribution area.WASHINGTON, April 26, 2016 Pilgrims...
